content: If we want to debate on the outcome of some tests of Touchstone related to terminology services, shall we use this stream or another?
Maybe the Terminology Services thread on the Connectathon Stream?
@François Macary, you may also email/reach out to our Touchstone Support via Touchstone_Support@aegis.net.
got it. STS has 96% success. I'll talk to Touchstone_Support for some of the failures.
@François Macary Are your testing details in ConMan? Or will you send them to me?
